about_the_game:
The visual novel development tool allows you to use a script format closer to natural language (e.g., English) writing and create demos with minimum effort, enabling visual novel development with a smaller feedback loop (effort to outcome).

What you need to feed into the tool:

  • Story scripts (docx/odt documents, markdown, plain text)

  • (Optional) assets (backgrounds, character sprites, music, etc)

What you can get from the tool:

  • Game engine project files (scripts and converted/generated assets)

  • Statistics & Reports (WIP)

We currently support Ren'Py and WebGal (experimental) as backends.

This is a free-and-open-source project. We also had a paper, "PrepPipe: Prototyping Compiler for Attainable Visual Novel Development," DOI: 10.1109/CoG60054.2024.10645615

WARNING: This tool is still under development. All contents on this store page are placeholders, and we will completely redo the page once the program is ready for production use. EA version's GUI  is only available in (Simplified) Chinese; the Internationalized version is still under development. The current release is mainly for testing. USE THIS TOOL AT YOUR OWN RISK. We will try hard to fix issues ASAP, however.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or above
  • Processor: 64-bit x86 Processor with 1GHz clock frequency or above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
